sections.paragraph: a military cohort, any band, company, or detachment, of soldiers
Part(s) of speech: Noun Feminine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (பெண்பால்)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Of immediate Latin origin, but ultimately a derivative of G138 in the sense of its cognate, G1507; a coil (spira, “spire”), that is, (figuratively) a mass of men (a Roman military cohort; also [by analogy] a squad of Levitical janitors): - band.
